issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Unity builds failing due to duplicate definition of IsArrowStringLiteral
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15028](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15028). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Builds of HEAD fail because of a duplicate definition in a symbol + unity builds. It appears ARROW-14431 perturbed things and accidentally exposed this.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15028?focusedCommentId=17455379) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11905
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11905>
